location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'ROUTES IN PERSIA VOL. III, PART I INDEX MAP'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 380 x 380mm, on sheet 480 x 464mm

mods.abstract: The map is a General Staff India publication marked for official use only, and accompanies Routes in Persia. Volume III, Part I.The map shows a region of central and southern Persia, indicating routes described in the volume, cities, towns, roads, tracks, paths, and the routes of telegraph lines and submarine cables. Numbers and letters printed in red identify the corresponding Survey of India sheets.The map was heliozincographed at the Survey of India Offices, Calcutta, and was prepared by the Simla Drawing Office; it includes a printing statement which reads 'S.D.O. No. 1568, Sept. 1916.'.

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
